EmailTemplate.description: Phones Quote Follow-up Proactive Communication (Non SAP)
EmailTemplate.name: Phones Quote Follow-up Proactive (Non SAP)
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}.
As discussed on our call, I have created quotation 1-XXXXXX, attached for your review.
If you have any questions or would like to place an order for this quote, please reply to this email.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
